metadata.name: Chromium Browser Headless Execution To Mockbin Like Site
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a Chromium based browser process with the "headless" flag and a URL pointing to the mockbin.org service (which can be used to exfiltrate data).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\vivaldi.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--headless')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://run.mocky')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('://mockbin'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a Chromium based browser process with the "headless" flag and a URL pointing to the mockbin.org service (which can be used to exfiltrate data).
